Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Cruzioseptin-17 (CZS-17, natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals, UCLL1c; XXA)
Sequence Information.Source: the splendid leaf frog,Cruziohyla calcarifer, Central and South America

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (95.7%) toCruzioseptin-16Activity:   Active against E. coli (MIC 55 uM), inactive: S.aureus (MIC 111 uM), and C.albicans (MIC 222 uM). Reg. 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Cuesta SA, Reinoso C, Morales F, Pilaquinga F, Morán-Marcillo G, Proaño-Bolaños C, Blasco-Zúñiga A, Rivera M, Meneses L.2021
Literature Information.Title: Novel antimicrobial cruzioseptin peptides extracted from the splendid leaf frog, Cruziohyla calcarifer
